thread.title: Bridget

author: Bridget
title: Bridget
text: I ordered a tree online and they told me it would ship sometime between 2017 and 2020. After two weeks when I hadn't heard anything, I got in touch with the orchard and asked where my tree was. They told me they didn't intend to ship it for another three months. I said that was unacceptable and asked for the tree now and when it arrived it was mostly dead and was fully dead within two days. Do not buy anything from these people.
